title: Incorporate the Ralph Wiggum technique into Hyperpowers
description:
Investigate and incorporate the Ralph Wiggum technique - an agentic coding pattern that uses a simple loop to continuously run AI agents for autonomous code generation.

## Background

The Ralph Wiggum Technique was created by Geoff Huntley. The core implementation is:

```bash
while :; do cat PROMPT.md | npx --yes @sourcegraph/amp ; done
```

## Key Concepts

- **Context Engineering**: Carving work into independent context windows rather than running indefinitely to avoid "overbaking"
- **Declarative Specifications**: Using detailed prompt files that describe desired outcomes
- **Iterative Refinement**: AI agent repeatedly processes prompts, refining across iterations

- Code refactoring with standardized guidelines
- Specification generation from requirements
- New project scaffolding
- Incremental improvements to existing codebases
